title: Beautiful Hotel but...tiny room
text:
Absolutely beautiful hotel from the lobby, bar, restaurants, hallways and the rooms, lovely decor and high end fixtures and fittings, L'Occitane bathroom products, a tablet device in the room to use, nice TV, well maintained aircon in the room, for cold very quickly and quietly.
My gripes; our room was minuscule, the door opened and nearly hit the bed (see pic) there was no room to sit down on the chair in there either as it couldn't come out far enough from the desk as the bed is there.
Also, Only enough room for one bedside table which is a nuisance when there is 2 of you.
The website states rooms have coffee machines so I was expecting an nespresso but all we had was a kettle and Instant Nescaf√© sachets?
When we checked out and I mentioned the room size the receptionist said they do bigger rooms but you pay extra, my fault for not checking. I'd stay here again.
It is around a 5-7 min walk to gloucs rd tube station but not a lot going on around the hotel which was fine for us, traffic noise was ok considering it's right on the Cromwell road.
The staff we saw were all super friendly and couldn't do enough for you particularly the doorman.
